channel.title: 🏢 College of Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 College of Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Revisiting Score Propagation in Graph Out-of-Distribution Detection
item.description: GRASP: A novel graph augmentation strategy boosts OOD node detection by strategically adding edges to enhance the intra-edge ratio, addressing score propagation’s limitations in various scenarios.
